title: METROPCS+TMOBILE GalaxyS4 M919N AIO ROOT,STOCKIMAGE,ROM+MORE -FI
description:
[u][b]Check your phone model in settings. This is for M919 and M919N phone.[/b]

[u]I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 M919N and have tested all of the files within the torrent on my own device[/u]


This torrent contains everything you need to modify/restore your Galaxy S4 for MetroPCS and M919N as of 04/28/14.Including the files necessary to root or return to stock with ODIN . The files for both T-Mobile and MetroPCS are included to fix a bricked phone.
